# semaphoreui_project_integration_extract_value (Data Source)

The project integration extract value data source allows you to read an existing integration extract value.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Lookup by Extract Value ID
data "semaphoreui_project_integration_extract_value" "extract_value" {
  project_id     = 1
  integration_id = 2
  id             = 3
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The extract value ID.
- `integration_id` (Number) The integration ID that this extract value belongs to.
- `project_id` (Number) The project ID that the integration belongs to.

### Read-Only

- `body_data_type` (String) The data type of the body. Valid values are `json`, `xml`, or `string`.
- `key` (String) The key to extract from the body or header.
- `name` (String) The display name of the extract value.
- `value_source` (String) Where to extract the value from. Valid values are `body` or `header`.
- `variable` (String) The variable name to store the extracted value.
- `variable_type` (String) The type of variable to set. Valid values are `environment` or `task`.
